alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kennebec County through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a thunderstorm near Winthrop, or 10 miles west of Augusta, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Gardiner, Litchfield, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell, Winthrop, Chelsea, Leeds, Monmouth, Readfield, West Gardiner, Wayne, Wales and Mount Vernon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 295 near mile marker 51. Interstate 95 between mile markers 95 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
